attributes.action: Allow people found guilty of crimes to be named and shamed regardless of age
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When someone is found guilty of a crime, they should be named and shamed and not given the protection of anonimity.
Although usually this happens in cases of persons under 16, why should they get protection?
If you are guilty then people have the right to know you are a criminal, as it may encourage the criminal not to re-offend
